text: Fischerhude is a village located next to the Wümme river in northern Germany between Bremen and Hamburg. Fischerhude is part of the municipality of Ottersberg, in the district of Verden.Historisches Gemeindeverzeichnis für die Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Namens-, Grenz- und Schlüsselnummernänderungen bei Gemeinden, Kreisen und Regierungsbezirken, W. Kohlhammer, Stuttgart/Mainz, 1983, , p. 247 It is well known as an art colony where artists like Otto Modersohn and Clara Westhoff used to work and live. == References == Category:Verden (district) Category:Villages in Lower Saxony
title: Fischerhude
